overview:
Comment tags represent content that should never appear in the resulting
output.

The tag's content may contain any substring (including newlines) EXCEPT the
closing delimiter.

Comment tags SHOULD be treated as standalone when appropriate.

tests.name: Inline
tests.desc: Comment blocks should be removed from the template.

tests.name: Standalone
tests.desc: Comments should not touch surrounding whitespace

tests.name: Indented Standalone
tests.desc: Comments should not touch surrounding whitespace

tests.name: Standalone Without Newline
tests.desc: Standalone tags should not require a newline to follow them.

tests.name: Multiline Standalone
tests.desc: All multiline standalone comments should be removed.

tests.name: Indented Multiline Standalone
tests.desc: All standalone comment lines should be removed.

tests.name: Indented Inline
tests.desc: Inline comments should not strip whitespace

tests.name: Surrounding Whitespace
tests.desc: Comment removal should preserve surrounding whitespace.
